metadata.synopsis: Three celestial beings (Alfre Woodard, Kate Nelligan, Alison Elliott) help two children travel through time to find their father and his lab partner.
metadata.genre: Art House & International/Kids & Family/Science Fiction & Fantasy

reviews: Disney, you will be relieved to hear, has done a decent job of adapting A Wrinkle in Time for television...
Somewhat clunky but mostly faithful to the book.
I haven't read the book, but I can't imagine, given its popularity, that it would have been read by as many people as it has if it were as mundane as this movie.
